targets.query: SELECT mean("total")  *0.05 FROM "disk" WHERE ("host" =~ /resif8/ AND "path" = '/mnt/nfs/summer/rawdata') AND $timeFilter GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("mean") FROM (SELECT mean("total") FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /resif8/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY "path" ) WHERE "path" =~ /(volume1_argent_performant$)/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)

SELECT sum("mean") FROM (SELECT mean("total") FROM "disk" WHERE "host" =~ /resif8/ AND  $timeFilter GROUP BY "path" ) WHERE "path" =~ /(volume1_argent_performant$)/ GROUP BY time($__interval) fill(null)
